titleStmt.title: The spirituall spring A sermon preached at Pauls, vvherein is declared the necessity of growing in grace, and the goodly gaine that comes thereby, &c. By Richard Lee, preacher of the word of God at Woluerhampton in Staffordshire.
titleStmt.author: Lee, Richard, d. 1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Samuel Man, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Swan,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Swan
